Question
========

The primary purpose of including `...` as an argument to your function is:

Answerlist
----------

* to pass the arguments captured by `...` to other functions
* to save typing
* to confuse the user
* because you aren't sure what the type of each argument is

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Correct.
* While it might save typing, that's not a great reason to use the `...`.
* No, we don't want to confuse the user, although that can be a side-effect.
* No, the type of the arguments is not important.
